Text:
Another fake by this guy. He keeps duplicating posts but sharing a single fake file that ends up to be an exe. The original post looks the same but you can click on the author and see his/her other posts. The original is made up of 62 files which match the 62 listed files, like most comic posts.

The original post is at http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5280316/Superman_-_New_Krypton._%20Beginning_to_1_13_10%20#0992383027349983430

What I don't get is, why the hell is this guy not getting banned by the mods here? You need to check the "Anonymous" checkbox while uploading the torrent, but surely the mods know which user exactly has logged in and uploaded all this crap anonymously?
